EmailTemplate.name: ACSM Request for additional information Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Additional information required for {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
The following additional information is required to resolve your issue:
• (Insert clarification 1) • (Insert clarification 2) • (Insert clarification 3)
Please respond to this email at your earliest opportunity, or contact us at Contact: 602-365-6416 / Toll free: 888-377-5375.
Your timely response is appreciated so that I may quickly resolve your issue.
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Honeywell Flight Support Services FSSTechSupport@Honeywell.com Contact: 602-365-6416 / Toll free: 888-377-5375 Case Ref ID: {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
